page.title: 02COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {TELEVISION}IS THE MOST COMMONLY WATCHED SOURCE OF NEWS.NEWSPAPERS ARE READ BY MOST ADULTS,THERE ARE NATIONAL PAPERS,AND PAPERS THAT CONCENTRATE ON LOCAL NEWS.AT THE WEEKEND THERE ARE EXTRA PAPERS THAT CONTAIN NEWS ARTICLES, AND MANY OTHER ITEMS OF INTE REST.THE MAJORITY OF THE FAMILIES IN OUR AREA HAVE A TELEPHONE, IT IS POSSIBLE TO CONTACT LOCAL AND DISTANT FRIENDS.IT IS ALSO POSSIBLE TO DIAL DIRECTLY TO DISTANT COUNTRIES;THIS CAN BE QUITE EXPENSIVE SO MOST CONVERSATIONS ARE SHORT.WE CAN WRITE TO OUR FRIENDS IN THIS COUNTRY, A LETTER COSTS US 17p FIRST CLASS 13p SECOND CLASS, WE CAN ALSO SEND PARCELS BY POST;THE COST VARIES ACCORDING TO THE WEIGHT.SOME OF OUR FATHERS USE V.H.F.RADIOS TO CONTACT EACH OTHER WHILST THEY ARE DRIVING THEIR TAXIS.SOME PEOPLE USE C.B.RADIOS.
